install.name: GCalendar Upcoming Events
install.author: G4J Project
install.copyright: This extension is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: This module shows the upcoming events from a google calendar.

field.name: date_format
field.label: Date format
field.description: The format of the date for an event (see http://www.php.net/strftime for details).

field.name: time_format
field.label: Time format
field.description: The format of the time for an event (see http://www.php.net/strftime for details).

field.name: max_events
field.label: Max events
field.description: The maximal count of events should be displayed.

field.name: order
field.label: Sort Order
field.description: The order strategy of the events.

field.name: find
field.label: Filter
field.description: Only events with the text will be shown.

field.name: images
field.label: Include Calendar Images
field.description: Choose Yes to display calendar images next to upcoming events. If Custom is selected the colors from below are set instead of the calendar colors.

field.name: calimage_background
field.label: Month Background Color
field.description: Enter a color to be displayed behind the Month text of the calendar image. This setting only applies if Include Calendar Images is set to Custom!!

field.name: calimage_month
field.label: Month Text Color
field.description: Enter a text color for the Month text on the calendar image. This setting only applies if Include Calendar Images is set to Custom!!

field.name: calimage_day
field.label: Day Text Color
field.description: Enter a text color for the Day text on the calendar image. This setting only applies if Include Calendar Images is set to Custom!!

field.name: text_before
field.label: Content before events
field.description: This text will be displayed before the event list.

field.name: output
field.label: Event output
field.description: Here you can customize the appearance of the event.

Here you can modify the event output. The following attributes of an event are provided:
{title}, {description}, {startdate}, {starttime}, {dateseparator}, {enddate}, {endtime} {where}, {backlink}, {link}, {maplink}, {calendarname}, {calendarcolor}

field.name: text_after
field.label: Content after events
field.description: This text will be displayed after the event list.

field.name: end_date
field.label: End Date
field.description: Limit to events that will start before the date, can be relative (must be a valid string which can be passed to strtotime http://php.net/manual/en/function.strtotime.php as reference).

field.name: gc_cache_time
field.label: Cache Time
field.description: The time before the module is recached in sec.
